article.title: FEMA Promotes Preparedness
article.author: Maryann Lawlor
article.abstract: The Federal Emergency Management Agency is establishing a Thunderclap account to encourage citizens to be ready for emergencies throughout 2014.
article.text: The Federal Emergency Management Agency (FEMA) has joined the UN and the White House in establishing a Thunderclap account. The agency’s goal is to encourage citizens to be prepared for emergencies. Thunderclap syncs social media accounts to release an automatic Facebook post, tweet or both. By signing up and using #Prepared2014 throughout 2014, friends and followers will be reminded to be ready for natural disasters and man-made emergencies throughout the year. Users can share preparedness messaging from the Ready.gov Facebook page and Twitter feed. Additional participation information is available online.
